attributes.action: Call an immediate General Election to re install public faith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An immediate general election is needed to allow the public to re elect the people who stand for us, we need to have faith in the people who stand for us and current issues have lost the little we have.

The Queen needs to impose this and help towards introducing faith back into the system, as all we believe in know is corruption!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
